scripts.build: astro check && astro build && yarn minify
scripts.minify: html-minifier-terser --input-dir dist --output-dir dist --config-file ./html-minifier-terser.config.json --file-ext html && html-minifier-terser --input-dir dist --output-dir dist --config-file ./html-minifier-terser.config.json --file-ext css && html-minifier-terser --input-dir dist --output-dir dist --config-file ./html-minifier-terser.config.json --file-ext svg
